ing: 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, or to taste
des: "This smoothie is smooth and creamy, the perfect consistency, just like a smoothie should be! You will taste hints of honey, vanilla, peanut butter, and banana. The smoothie is very filling and great for breakfast or on the go!"
ins: Put banana, ice, oats, yogurt, skim milk, peanut butter, honey, and cinnamon, respectively, in a blender; blend until smooth.
